title: Joshua Tree National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             Park News      News ReleasesThe National Park Service makes every effort to keep you informed about breaking news, special events, and new and ongoing projects. News releases for Joshua Tree National Park are posted and archived here, so check back often to keep current with the latest happenings at the park. Park NewspaperThe park newspaper is a great resource to help you plan your trip to Joshua Tree and learn more about the park, its mission, and its resources.Other Ways to Stay ConnectedFacebookLike Joshua Tree National Park on Facebook to see beautiful photography and regular updates on what's going on in the park.InstagramWe post stunning photos of Joshua Tree National Park on Instagram, and love to see the images you share.TwitterFollow our official Twitter feed, @JoshuaTreeNPS, for news and fun facts about the park.FlickrDo you need photos for a news story, school project, or your desktop? Joshua Tree maintains an extensive photo collection on Flickr. All images are public domain and free to use; most are high-resolution. Please credit NPS and the appropriate photographer, as noted for each image.YouTubeFrom brief Nature Minutes to in-depth tours with a park ranger, our official YouTube channel is home to our shareable videos.
